name: Dart Monkey
inGameDesc: Throws a single dart at nearby bloons. Short range and low pierce but cheap.

name: Boomerang Monkey
inGameDesc: Hurls a boomerang that follows a curved path. Good range and pierce.

name: Bomb Shooter
inGameDesc: Launches a powerful bomb at the Bloons. Slow rate of fire but affects a radius around the explosion.

name: Tack Shooter
inGameDesc: Shoots a short range volley of sharp tacks in 8 directions.

name: Ice Monkey
inGameDesc: Pops and freezes nearby Bloons for a short time. Frozen Bloons are immune to sharp damage. Can't freeze White, Zebra, or Lead Bloons.

name: Glue Gunner
inGameDesc: Shoots a blob of sticky glue that slows Bloons down by 50%

name: Sniper Monkey
inGameDesc: Can shoot Bloons it can see anywhere on the screen with a long-range rifle, and pops 2 layers off Bloons hit by it.

name: Monkey Sub
inGameDesc: Shoots homing torp-e-darts at nearby Bloons. Must be placed in water.

name: Monkey Buccaneer
inGameDesc: Shoots a single, heavy dart from both sides of the ship. Must be placed in water.

name: Monkey Ace
inGameDesc: Flies above the ground shooting volleys of high-pierce darts.

name: Heli Pilot
inGameDesc: Hovers wherever you direct it. Shoots from twin heavy dart guns.

name: Mortar Monkey
inGameDesc: Launches an exploding mortar shell to a fixed location anywhere on the screen.

name: Dartling Gunner
inGameDesc: Uses a dart-shooting machine-gun. Aims wherever you point on the screen.

name: Wizard Monkey
inGameDesc: Hurls magical bolts of energy at the Bloons. Can upgrade to a variety of powerful spells.

name: Super Monkey
inGameDesc: Throws hundreds of darts at hypersonic speed with a huge attack range.

name: Ninja Monkey
inGameDesc: Stealthy and fast Monkey that throws bladed shurikens to pop the Bloons. Can target Camo Bloons.

name: Alchemist
inGameDesc: Harnessing powers of science and magic, splashes Bloons with acid, also brews various potions with different effects.

name: Druid
inGameDesc: Creates a blast of thorns for each attack. Upgrades can call forth powers of the Jungle, Storm, or Wrath.

name: Banana Farm
inGameDesc: Generates Bananas each round that convert into game money to spend on more stuff.

name: Spike Factory
inGameDesc: Automatically generates piles of Road Spikes on the nearby track. Excellent last line of defense.

name: Monkey Village
inGameDesc: Hub of Monkey industry, has a number of different benefits to aid all of your Monkeys. Increases range of all Monkeys in its radius by 10%.

name: Engineer Monkey
inGameDesc: Holds a trusty nail-gun to pop the Bloons. Can upgrade to create its own nail-shooting sentry turrets.

name: Beast Handler
inGameDesc: Trains land, water, or air beasts. Multiple Beast Handlers can have their own beasts, or combine efforts to train a single beast with greater beast power.
